name: Recipe: Fine Tea, Full Moon
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fine Tea, Full Moon.

value.text:
World Quest Series - Chenyu's Blessings of Sunken Jade
Quest - Qiaoying of the Sacred Mountain

customize.name: Chenyu Adeptea
customize.desc: Tea grown in warm, moist areas in Chenyu Vale. After millennia of careful cultivation, the tea today emits a rich fragrance that can be savored from several streets away.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Fine Tea, Full Moon
customize.desc: A tea pastry containing egg yolk. The salted yolk is first steamed, then stuffed and wrapped in tea powder-infused dough. It's then kneaded into the shape of a full moon before being baked. This results in a crispy, flaky exterior with a salty and sweet interior, the different layers forming a delicious and addictive delicacy.
